title: "Professor McIntosh Delivers Keynote at ASE 2023"
date: "2023-12-10"
description: "Professor McIntosh presents keynote on the future of automated build systems at ASE 2023, highlighting latest research findings."
link: "#"
---

Professor Shane McIntosh delivered a keynote speech at the 38th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE 2023). His talk, titled "The Future of Automated Build Systems," highlighted emerging trends in build automation and presented our group's latest findings on build optimization techniques.
